name: Dimensions One
description:
Dimensions One is a short puzzle horror game where you use separate yet similar dimensions to get through test chambers.

Current version: Alpha 0.0.1.1

Minimum requirements:

GTX 950 or similar

I3 or similar

8GB of ram

3GB of hard drive space

This game is still in very early development so expect bugs and glitches.

Also some of the game is still untextured so might look a bit rough and it's set to the lowest setting since I haven't added any graphics settings yet.

Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/Cappo
